basePath.description: Path segment that must be prepended to the path when accessing the API via this mapping. If omitted, the API is exposed at the root of the given domain.

domainName.description: Already-registered domain name to connect the API to.

restApi.description: ID of the API to connect.

stageName.description: Name of a specific deployment stage to expose at the given path. If omitted, callers may select any stage by including its name as a path element after the base path.

domainName.description: Already-registered domain name to connect the API to.

restApi.description: ID of the API to connect.

stageName.description: Name of a specific deployment stage to expose at the given path. If omitted, callers may select any stage by including its name as a path element after the base path.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering BasePathMapping resources.
